
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.


get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_protoc_bin
  TOOL_protoc_dependency
  contrib/tools/protoc/bin
  protoc
)
get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_cpp_styleguide_bin
  TOOL_cpp_styleguide_dependency
  contrib/tools/protoc/plugins/cpp_styleguide
  cpp_styleguide
)
get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_protoc_bin
  TOOL_protoc_dependency
  contrib/tools/protoc/bin
  protoc
)
get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_cpp_styleguide_bin
  TOOL_cpp_styleguide_dependency
  contrib/tools/protoc/plugins/cpp_styleguide
  cpp_styleguide
)

add_library(server-lib-controller_agent)
target_compile_options(server-lib-controller_agent PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
)
target_include_directories(server-lib-controller_agent PUBLIC
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt
)
target_link_libraries(server-lib-controller_agent PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  #contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  yt-yt-ytlib
  server-lib-scheduler
  server-lib-job_agent
  contrib-libs-protobuf
)
target_proto_messages(server-lib-controller_agent PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/controller_agent/proto/job_tracker_service.proto
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/controller_agent/proto/job_spec_service.proto
)
target_sources(server-lib-controller_agent PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/controller_agent/serialize.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/controller_agent/structs.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/controller_agent/persistence.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/controller_agent/progress_counter.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/controller_agent/read_range_registry.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/controller_agent/job_size_constraints.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/controller_agent/helpers.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/controller_agent/public.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/controller_agent/job_report.cpp
)
target_proto_addincls(server-lib-controller_agent
  ./yt
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/protobuf/src
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/protobuf/src
)
target_proto_outs(server-lib-controller_agent
  --cpp_out=${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt
  --cpp_styleguide_out=${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt
)
